name: 03_pasta
description: Please add your work to the thread :slightly_smiling_face: Rest of the day - Your task is to create a RESTful application using the MVC Architecture Not a group activity, but feel free to reach out to members of your BA group for support     GET /things     GET /things/:id     POST /things     PATCH /things/:id     DELETE /things/:id     Readme that explains how to run the API
